languages.text: "Довольно, Владайм! Я надеялся смирить твою гордыню, но ты слишком закоренел в гордыне и ереси! Верные Императору, постоим за наместника Его, Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус!"

"Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно, Владайм! Я надеялся смирить твою гордыню, но ты слишком закоренел в гордыне и ереси! Верные Императору, постоим за наместника Его, Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too set in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “够了，弗拉迪姆！我本希望你能收敛一下你的做派，可你的傲慢与异端行为已经根深蒂固了！所有忠于帝皇的人啊，为了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人而战吧！”
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: “够了，弗拉迪姆！我本希望你能收敛一下你的做派，可你的傲慢与异端行为已经根深帝国了！所有忠于帝皇的人啊，为了冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人而战吧！”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「ヴラダイム、もう十分だ！お前の高いプライドを和らげることができればと思っていたが、あまりにも傲慢で異端がすぎる！皇帝に忠実な者たちよ、我らが領主、自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスの為に立ち上がるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイム、もう十分だ！お前の高いプライドを和らげることができればと思っていたが、あまりにも傲慢で異端がすぎる！皇帝に忠実な者たちよ、我らが領主、自由開拓者、フォン・ヴァランシウスの為に立ち上がるのだ！」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¡Basta, Vladaym! Esperaba poder templar su orgullo, ¡pero está demasiado metido en sus costumbres arrogantes y heréticas! Todos aquellos fieles al Emperador, ¡defendamos {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta, Vladaym! Esperaba poder templar su orgullo, ¡pero está demasiado metido en sus costumbres arrogantes y heréticas! Todos aquellos fieles al Emperador, ¡defendamos {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius!».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Genug, Vladaym! Ich hatte gehofft, ich könnte Euren Stolz zügeln, doch Ihr steckt zu sehr in Euren arroganten, ketzerischen Wegen fest! All Ihr, die Ihr an den Imperator glaubt, kämpfen wir für {mf|seinen Lehnsherren, Freihändler|seine Lehnsherrin, Freihändlerin} von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug, Vladaym! Ich hatte gehofft, ich könnte Euren Stolz zügeln, doch Ihr steckt zu sehr in Euren arroganten, ketzerischen Wegen fest! All Ihr, die Ihr an den Imperator glaubt, kämpfen wir für {mf|seinen Lehnsherren, Freihändler|seine Lehnsherrin, Freihändlerin} von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Ça suffit, Vladaym ! J'espérais pouvoir modérer votre fierté, mais vous êtes décidément trop ancré dans votre arrogance et vos habitudes hérétiques ! À tous ceux qui restent fidèles à l'Empereur, combattons aux côtés de {mf|Son suzerain|Sa suzeraine}, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, Vladaym ! J'espérais pouvoir modérer votre fierté, mais vous êtes décidément trop ancré dans votre arrogance et vos habitudes hérétiques ! À tous ceux qui restent fidèles à l'Empereur, combattons aux côtés de {mf|Son suzerain|Sa suzeraine}, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Vladaym, yeter! Kibrini dizginleyebilmeyi umuyordum ama küstahlığa ve kâfirliğe teslim olmuşsun sen! İmparator'a sadıksanız Hür Tacir von Valancius Hazretleri'nin saflarına katılın!"
languages.original_text: "Enough, Vladaym! I was hoping I could temper your pride, but you are too rooted in your arrogant and heretical ways! All you faithful to the Emperor, let us take a stand for His liege, Rogue Trader von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym, yeter! Kibrini dizginleyebilmeyi umuyordum ama küstahlığa ve kâfirliğe teslim olmuşsun sen! İmparator'a sadıksanız Hür Tacir Von Valancius Hazretleri'nin saflarına katılın!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
